alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:54PM EDT until April 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/. * At 654 PM EDT/554 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chipley to 14 miles southeast of Vernon to 8 miles northeast of Lynn Haven to 6 miles west of Tyndall Air Force Base, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Union City, Chipola, Camps Head, Overstreet, Scotts Ferry, Youngstown, Star and Davis Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
